title: Sekai Meisaku Douwa: Oyayubi Hime
synopsis: This anime movie is an adaption from the famous fairytale for kids Thumbelina, that aired 1978 in Japan.
staff: [['Serikawa, Yuugo', ['Director']], ['Matsumoto, Kenji', ['Background Art']], ['Ito, Michihiro', ['Sound Effects']], ['Katsumata, Geki', ['Background Art']]]
